topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5497aa306368724bdd6f1300#post_5497aa306368724bdd6f1300
Sure, I'm a copywriter, so I write whatever my clients want me to write about. The weirdest thing I had to write about was vaginal infections. 

I also write for fun, it's non-fiction funny stuff. It's mostly reflections of my own about how life and society works. 

Perhaps the most interesting thing for you is a role playing game rulebook that I wrote for bronies.
topics.author: 521b8244a4c72d5052005638

"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5497abbc6368724058d50800#post_5497abbc6368724058d50800
Let me see if I get them right.
Jojo is a fighting video game, I think you have like shadows or spirits along with your character.
Touhou is a type of Godzilla movies.
Vocaloids are Japanese characters that sing, Miku is the most popular one.

Did I get them right?
